body:
This is a very common error. I Wonder if the go tool could.be more helpful
if I refused to cross compile with cgo enabled unless CC was set.

Cherry/Minux what do you think?

On Fri, 19 Aug 2016, 13:26 cherrymui <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> You'll need to set CC to the C cross-compiler, e.g.
> CC=arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc.
